nodes.text: A cometduster was an alcoholic beverage that was popular in the Outer Rim during the early years of the New Republic. The drink was known to Han Solo, who once specifically ordered a pair for himself and Leia Organa in a Mos Espa bar. It was also a drink that Celia, a dancer at the bar, knew how to make without difficulty.
Once mixed, a machine excited the molecules in the drink which gave the drinker a mild electrifying sensation in the tongue.
